Body:
cluster = 'FargateCluster'
subnet_id = ' subnet-49391932'
security_group_id = 'sg-e6ea548e'
task_name = 'create_and_run_task:45'
task_arn = 'arn:aws:ecs:eu-west-2:244560807427:task-definition/{0}'.format(
    task_name)
task_run_arn = self.fargate.task_run(cluster, task_arn, subnet_id,
    security_group_id).get('taskArn')
task_details = self.fargate.task_wait_for_completion(cluster, task_run_arn,
    sleep_for=1, log_status=True)
Dev.pprint(task_details)
